articles.title: Shareholders of oil giant Shell vote in favor of London move - CNBC
articles.description: Critics of the move argue Shell's proposed relocation is partly motivated by a landmark courtroom defeat earlier this year, a decision the company is appealing.
articles.content: LONDON Shareholders of oil giant Royal Dutch Shell on Friday voted to approve plans for the company to overhaul its legal and tax structure and move its headquarters to the U.K. from the Netherlands.… [+3169 chars]
